text: The 1977 European Karate Championships, the 12th edition of the European Karate Championships, was held in the sports complex of Coubertine Hall in Paris, France from May 2 to 4, 1977. ==Competition== {| |- | Kumite -65 kg | Laurent Saïdane | | |- | Kumite -70 kg | Willy Voss | Franco Paganini | |- | Kumite - 75 kg | Jose Martinez | Christian Gauze | |- | Kumite - 80 kg | Stan Knighton | | |- | Kumite - + 80 kg | Pierre Montel | | Massimo Di Luigi |- | Open Kumite | Ludwig Kotzebue | Michael Dinsdale | Willy Voss |- |} === Team kumite === {| |- | Kata | | | |} ==References== ==External links== *Karate Records - European Championship 1977 1977 Category:International sports competitions hosted by France European Karate Championships European championships in 1977 Category:International sports competitions hosted by Paris Category:1977 in Paris Category:Karate competitions in France Category:May 1977 sports events in Europe
title: 1977 European Karate Championships
